statements: DELETE FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE officer_id = 101 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM community_policing_initiatives WHERE officer_id = 5 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PoliceOfficers WHERE officer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CommunityPolicingInitiatives WHERE initiative_id = 101 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PoliceOfficers WHERE years_of_service > 10 AND rank = 'Sergeant';
DELETE FROM initiative_evaluation WHERE initiative_id = 101 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM policing_reports WHERE officer_name='John Doe' AND report_date >= '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM community_policing_projects WHERE project_id = 10 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
